item.title: A Music Album
item.dc:creator: pippin
item.content:encoded: This is a sample product that show cases the Audio Player extension. You can easily setup price options to purchase individual songs or the entire album.

item.title: Hello world!
item.dc:creator: pippin
item.content:encoded: Welcome to Easy Digital Downloads Sites. This is your first post. Edit or delete it, then start blogging!

item.title: Home
item.dc:creator: pippin
item.content:encoded: This is the demonstration site for Easy Digital Downloads. The plugin is shown here with default configuration (no customization) and a few of the add-on plugins available from the Extensions page. Visit the ProductsGrid page to view the a sample products page. [downloads columns=2 excerpt_length=20 number=4]

item.title: Transaction Failed
item.dc:creator: pippin
item.content:encoded: Your transaction failed, please try again or contact site support.
